summary.span: 提供 控制項的控制項陣列。

span.span: Provides a control array of controls

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RichTextBoxArray`類別提供對等項目執行階段功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`RichTextBox`控制項陣列。The `RichTextBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `RichTextBox` control array. 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於按一下 中的 時。

span.span: Occurs when a in a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Click`事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式。The `Click` event passes an to its event handler. 因此它只會顯示已發生按。Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 不過，如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定應該才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間的時間。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks. `Click`每當按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked. 例如，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`和控制項的事件`Click`和按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and events of a control, the `Click` and events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the `Click` event might be raised two times. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將中表單的屬性事件處理方法來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyPress` `KeyPress`非字元的索引鍵不會引發事件; 不過，並引發非字元按鍵和事件。The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the and events. 使用屬性範例按鍵輸入，在執行階段，並且將會使用或修改一般按鍵的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將中表單的屬性事件處理方法來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於放開按鍵且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when a key is released and the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：Key events occur in the following order: `KeyUp` 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將中表單的屬性事件處理方法來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in the form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置時。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`子控制項所新增或移除，當控制項變更，以及其他可能變更的範圍可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 配置事件，可以使用抑制和方法。The layout event can be suppressed by using the and methods. 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的配置。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項，每一項作業將會引發`Layout`事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於輸入焦點離開控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將焦點變更使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等），或藉由呼叫或方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the or method, focus events occur in the following order: `Leave` 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Leave` 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於使用者按一下控制項文字內的連結時。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on a link within the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立處理連結已經在控制項中按下此事件的事件處理常式。You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control. 使用事件處理常式所提供的資訊，您可以判斷哪一個連結已按下文件中。By using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於控制項失去或獲得滑鼠捕捉時。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，就會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` 關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生事件，而不是第二個`MouseClick`事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們通常會引發受到其他動作，例如，當控制項取得焦點時按下 ENTER 鍵。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於以滑鼠按一下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，就會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseClick` 關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生事件，而不是第二個`MouseClick`事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second `MouseClick` event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是以邏輯方式較高層級圖形的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a shape. 它們通常會受到其他動作，例如，按下 ENTER 鍵，當焦點在圖形時引發。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the shape has focus. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於使用滑鼠按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，就會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: 關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生`DoubleClick`事件，而不是第二個事件。Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a `DoubleClick` event instead of the second event. > [!NOTE] > 事件是以邏輯方式較高層級圖形的事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a shape. 它們通常會受到其他動作，例如，按下 ENTER 鍵，當焦點在圖形時引發。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the shape has focus. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件的事件處理常式，在您的應用程式，以判斷何時使用者已嘗試修改已標示為受保護控制項中的文字。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has tried to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 可以用事件處理常式，以通知文字的使用者嘗試修改的使用者受保護或顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以進行適當的變更的文字。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is trying to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保護的區域是日期，您可以顯示對話方塊，讓使用者選取的日期，然後可以套用至控制項的文字。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to select a date that can then be applied to the text of the control. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SetIndex`控制項陣列中建立的初始項目時，應該只呼叫方法。The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array. 若要將後續項目，呼叫方法並指定`Index`。To add subsequent elements, call the method and specify the `Index`. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: `Validated` 如果屬性設定為`false`、和`Validated`事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and `Validated` events are suppressed. 如果屬性設`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件事件都會被隱藏。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
